about_the_game:
A word from Tim Climpy


Hi, I'm Tim Climpy and welcome to my PvP FPS Warfair game. As an expert in military warfare, i decided to collaborate with Common Blob on a first person shooter. I was thrilled to lend my expertise to them. Unfortunately, they seemed to have ignored a lot of what I said, which is disappointing. I dont recall ever using a flamethrower with a grappling hook while parachuting ever. Not in my approximately 40 years experience! Anyway, i digress, I did lend my knowledge, whether they used it or not.



Battle your friends (and enemies?) on 12 maps across the world to see who comes top of the leader board.

Featuring

  • Over 280 character customisation options

  • 27+ Weapons - Assault Rifles, Pistols, Snipers, SMGs, Minigun, Shotguns, Grenades
  • 13 Maps
  • Modify your weapons to include different Muzzles, Scopes, Grips, Camos


  • Integration with Ready Player Me
  • Parachute!
  • Lay prone and dive!
  • Ziplines
  • Limb removal!
  • Set the time and weather for night time conflict, or in the middle of a thunderstorm

  • An audio engine to model geometry to calculate audio occlusion, reverb and dampening effects, creating a more realistic audio experience
  • Many Gamemodes
    • Classic Free-For-All mode
    • Another classic Team Deathmatch
    • Yet another classic Capture the Flag
    • HODL mode where you need to hold the point
    • Gunrace, get a kill with a gun to move onto the next weapon.
    • Kill Confirmed - pickup the bag to confirm the kill and gain the point

  • Modify each game mode with game mods:
    • Chunk - After every kill you get bigger and stronger, there is no end to how much you can grow
    • Tiny - After every kill you get smaller!
    • Big Head Mode - Big heads all round. Surely more headshots?
    • Bouncy-Bouncy - Bouncing platforms are scattered across the maps
    • Hardcore - Lose the minimap, health bars and ammo count and rely on your instincts
    • Paintball - Half damage, paint splats, larger bullet drop, exaggerated ragdolling
  • Drivable vehicles
    • Cars
    • Tanks
    • Planes
    • Helicopters
  • Bots, for when no-one else is around!
  • Level up and unlock new items, skins, weapons, attachments, camos
  • Some destructible environments

content_descriptors.notes: Use of guns and explosives along with blood sprays and gore

detailed_description:
A word from Tim Climpy


Hi, I'm Tim Climpy and welcome to my PvP FPS Warfair game. As an expert in military warfare, i decided to collaborate with Common Blob on a first person shooter. I was thrilled to lend my expertise to them. Unfortunately, they seemed to have ignored a lot of what I said, which is disappointing. I dont recall ever using a flamethrower with a grappling hook while parachuting ever. Not in my approximately 40 years experience! Anyway, i digress, I did lend my knowledge, whether they used it or not.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ or AMD Ryzen with 4+ cores
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 770 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ or AMD Ryzen with 4+ cores
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050 or AMD Radeon 560
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Tim Climpy's Warfair

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ or AMD Ryzen with 4+ cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 770 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ or AMD Ryzen with 4+ cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050 or AMD Radeon 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A military FPS shooter with a focus on fun things for fun people!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
